key_risk_themes: ["Distributed System Complexity & Data Integrity","External Third-Party API Dependencies","Operational Readiness for High Performance & Scale"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize technical spike and rigorous design for the Saga pattern to mitigate data consistency risks (RISK-001).","Integrate continuous performance testing into the CI/CD pipeline early to de-risk aggressive latency targets (RISK-003).","Finalize and test all resilience patterns (Circuit Breakers, Fallbacks) for critical third-party integrations, especially the payment gateway (RISK-002)."]
